Detailed Description

A basic AI interface.

This class implements most the code an AI would need to interface with the lower-level game code. AIs should extend this class to get a lot of boiler-plate code out of the way The provided AI class does just that.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void BaseAI::end ( ) [pure virtual]

This function is called after the last turn.

Implemented in AI.

virtual void BaseAI::init ( ) [pure virtual]

This function is run once, before your first turn.

Implemented in AI.

virtual const char* BaseAI::password ( ) [pure virtual]

Make this your password, which should be provided.

Implemented in AI.

virtual bool BaseAI::run ( ) [pure virtual]

This function is called each time it is your turn Return true to end your turn, return false to ask the server for updated information

Implemented in AI.

virtual const char* BaseAI::username ( ) [pure virtual]

Make this your username, which should be provided.

Implemented in AI.
